commit message: Use an IntentService with a notification, instead of AsyncTask with a ProgressDialog.
Removed unused classes after migrating DBOpAsyncTask to DBOpIntentService
Removed the Task interface.  Removed ProgressDialogFragment.  Cleanup.

Show a toast before beginning a db op.

Moved NotificationProgressListener to its own class.
ProgressListener.onError() and onComplete() take string arguments.
Fix title of onComplete notification
Show progress in the notification. Use a bigtext style.
Don't show a toast at the end of the db operation. Change the notification icon.
Improve the string used for both db deletion and limiting the db size.
Fix bug where you couldn't go back after starting a db operation.

Remove material dialogs library.

Thanks guys, it was a great library, but now with appcompat added,
and progress dialogs removed, you're not needed anymore :(
Disable db ops if one is in progress (added otto bus)
Make db operations cancelable
Fix Android Studio code inspection issues
Rename some strings
Translated db notif strings into French and Spanish
Simplified calls to Notification Builder
Handle the import of a corrupt db file
Some minor adjustments to the db ops notifications
Fix for not being able to go back after file export.
Show the name of the db operation in progress, in the main activity
Fixing some strings
Use a big text in the error notification
Added some support library annotations for resource ids
Android Studio code inspection fixes
Merge branch 'remove-progress-dialogs'
New version 1.24.0
Fix copyright in one strings xml file
Only update the notification progress every 500ms
Added proguard mapping for 1.24.0
